sentences.en: Anney dabbed the cut with disinfectant and taped a gauze square over it.
sentences.cn: 安妮用消毒剂轻涂伤口,接着又贴上一块方纱布.

sentences.en: Handicraft gauze lanterns present the demeanour of the Tang Dynasty.
He put on a pad of gauze and a strip of adhesive tape over the wound.
sentences.cn: 他在伤口上贴了一块纱布再加一条橡皮膏.

sentences.en: His hands were wrapped in gauze bandages.
Please press the wound with gauze. I'll adjust the seat back.
sentences.cn: 请用纱布按住伤口, 我来调节座位.

sentences.en: Production variety: garments, curtain, gauze, etc. Especially for continuous embroidered fabrics products.
sentences.cn: 适于: 各式衣服, 窗帘, 薄纱等单层面料的连续刺绣.

sentences.en: Remove the tapes and gauze at ends of the polythene tubings.
sentences.cn: 取下塑胶管一端的胶布和纱布.

sentences.en: Scrub each optical surface with a gauze pad soaked in acetone.
sentences.cn: 或者用含丙酮的网垫擦洗光学表面.

sentences.en: Shandong Anticancer Plasters is a black adhesive plaster spread upon a gauze.
sentences.cn: 本品为摊于布上的黑膏药.

sentences.en: She bound up the child's bleeding wound with gauze.
sentences.cn: 她把小孩出血的伤口用纱布包扎起来了.

sentences.en: She lapped my finger with gauze.
sentences.cn: 她用绷带将我的手指包起来.

sentences.en: Strain the juice through a piece of gauze or a sieve.
sentences.cn: 用一块纱布或过滤网将果汁过滤一下。

sentences.en: The doctor bound the wound with gauze.

sentences.cn: 裹在他伤口上的纱布脏了.

sentences.en: WEN SI DUN 4 lookings at the outside of the gauze curtain absent - mindedly .
sentences.cn: 温斯顿 心不在焉 地看着薄纱窗帘的外面.

sentences.en: Wipe gums with a clean, damp cloth or gauze pad.
sentences.cn: 用一块干净的湿润的棉布或者纱布擦拭牙龈.

trans.tran_cn: 纱布（包扎伤口用），薄纱，纱网，（金属丝制的）网纱
trans.tran_en: very thin transparent material with very small holes in it
